category: news
title: "Amazon introduces warehouse robots amid fears of labour shortage"
excerpt: "Amazon has debuted its first fully autonomous mobile robot as a leaked internal memo suggests the company will run out of US labour supply by 2024. Amazon unveiled its Proteus warehouse robot, which will operate alongside human workers to slot underneath package carts and push them along the factory floor."
